alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:16PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southern Walton and western Washington Counties through 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/... At 215 PM EDT/115 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach to 11 miles southwest of Vernon. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Portland, Seminole Hills, Seaside, Rock Hill, Millers Ferry, Knox Hill, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad, Port Washington and Bruce. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
